title: Microsoft Outage "Affecting IT Operations" Paris Olympics Organisers
content: Paris Olympics organisers said on Friday they were experiencing problems linked to a major worldwide computer systems outage, a week before the Games' opening ceremony takes place.
summary: Paris Olympics organisers said on Friday they were experiencing problems linked to a major worldwide computer systems outage, a week before the Games' opening ceremony takes place.

title: Opinion: Biden Or Trump, It's Still A Long Wait For Indian 'Dreamers' In US
content: Around 2,000 of "dreamers" in the US are Indian, and they are now eligible to apply for employment-based visas, like the H1-B.
summary: Around 2,000 of "dreamers" in the US are Indian, and they are now eligible to apply for employment-based visas, like the H1-B.

title: "Fix Deployed": CEO Of Firm Behind Global Microsoft Outage
content: In its first statement after the massive Microsoft outage caused by an update to CrowdStrike 'Falcon Sensor', the security firm's CEO has said the issue has been isolated and a fix has been deployed.
summary: In its first statement after the massive Microsoft outage caused by an update to CrowdStrike 'Falcon Sensor', the security firm's CEO has said the issue has been isolated and a fix has been deployed.

title: Watch: US Robber Livestreams High-Speed Chase With Baby In The Back Seat
content: During the chase, the suspect livestreamed himself evading the police, while a woman in the background pleaded with him to let her and their baby out of the car.
summary: During the chase, the suspect livestreamed himself evading the police, while a woman in the background pleaded with him to let her and their baby out of the car.

title: Y2K Bug: The Last Time There Was A Global PC Outage Of This Scale
content: Just like the Y2K bug had the world on edge at the turn of the millennium, Windows users on Friday experienced a similar sense of panic.

title: Steve Jobs' "3rd-Rate Products" Jab At Microsoft Amid Global Cloud Outage
content: Microsoft makes "third-rate products" - Apple co-founder Steve Jobs' damning assessment of the Seattle-based software giant, made back in 1995, went viral Friday as the company battles a major Windows outage issue.
summary: Microsoft makes "third-rate products" - Apple co-founder Steve Jobs' damning assessment of the Seattle-based software giant, made back in 1995, went viral Friday as the company battles a major Windows outage issue.

title: Halfway Through The Current Solar Cycle, The Sun Is Starting Its Next
content: Even though the Sun is just halfway through its current cycle, the first rumblings of its next 11-year solar cycle have been detected in sound waves within it, according to a team of researchers.
summary: Even though the Sun is just halfway through its current cycle, the first rumblings of its next 11-year solar cycle have been detected in sound waves within it, according to a team of researchers.

title: Fliers Get Handwritten Boarding Passes After Microsoft Outage Hits Systems
content: With a global Microsoft outage hitting tech systems in airports across the world, air carriers in India are checking in passengers manually.

title: Cyber Outage Hits Government, Media And Telcos In Australia, New Zealand
content: A cyber outage related to an issue at global cybersecurity firm Crowdstrike and Microsoft hit media, retailers, banks, airlines and telecoms companies across Australia and New Zealand on Friday.

title: Riots Break Out In London, Bus Set On Fire, Police Car Flipped Over

title: Explained: What Is Causing The Dreaded 'Blue Screen Of Death' On Windows?

title: Trump Shooter's Father Called Cops About Missing Gun Before Attack: Report

title: 200-Million-Year-Old "Well-Preserved" Dinosaur Fossil Found In Brazil Flood
content: Torrential rains causing historic flooding in southern Brazil have revealed a "very well-preserved" dinosaur fossil dating back some 200 million years, according to the research team who discovered it.
summary: Torrential rains causing historic flooding in southern Brazil have revealed a "very well-preserved" dinosaur fossil dating back some 200 million years, according to the research team who discovered it.
